item.title: Cloud Service Providers Colocate With Customers
item.description: A new trend is emerging, and it’s not just about companies moving their data to the cloud. Now, cloud service providers are moving into the same facilities as their customers. Why is this happening? Companies are realizing that running applications on distant servers can’t match the speed of having them on-site. While this can be addressed by investing in high-bandwidth, low-latency connections, it’s often more cost-effective to simply be in the same location as your provider.
